Description:
Easy Living
If time is most important to you; whether you are busy working, having fun or enjoying travelling... you just want to live life on your terms, than look no further. This separate unit has no body corporate, is meticulously maintained and offers a huge area to entertain, store or for-fill your hobby dreams... whatever it is you do. Consisting of 2 bedrooms both with built in robes, a practical kitchen 7 years young, a functional bathroom, parquetry timber flooring, a reverse cycle split system plus gas heating and instantaneous hot water (so you never run out of hot water). With a huge wrap around verandah that has now been enclosed so you can entertain year round, also allows access from the garage to the house under cover, with the garage being remote access, life will be easy. On approximately 300 sqm allotment in walking distance to Corio Shopping Central, Schools & Bus Stops just up the road plus Ring Road access a mere few turns away, it doesn't get any more convenient. A real surprise package that will allow you to live your life, your way.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist
Insights: 2/145 Purnell Road, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2020 and 9 other 2 bedroom unit in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Investment Opportunity Family Home 612sqm
CURRENTLY TENANTED (12 MONTH LEASE) AT $320 PER WEEK! Great return.
Practical brick home with electric security shutters to all front windows, this light filled home provides affordable family accommodation with three large bedrooms (master with built in robe), lounge with split system heating and cooling, ornate period features,separate dining area next to the practical kitchen with stand-alone oven. Central family bathroom with shower over bath, large laundry and separate mud room from the rear entry. Low maintenance large back yard offers plenty of room plus secure car accommodation with the over sized single garage and the addition of the high carport that offers lodging for a trailer or boat. Close to the ring Road you're already on your way to Melbourne or the Coast! Great first home or add to your investment portfolio.
Private inspections only.
Internal area
100m²

Description:
More than meets the eye.
Barry Plant Geelong is proud to present this great opportunity to purchase this well-loved home on a 612m2 (approx.) allotment within minutes walk to the Corio Shopping Centre, local schools, public transport & the Princes Highway for commuters. Located at the front of the property is a large living area with gas heating and split system cooling for all year comfort, which then flows through to three comfortable sized bedrooms (all with BIRs).
Whilst the kitchen and meals areas are in the centre of the home, providing ample cupboard space and views of the rear yard. Added bonuses of a two car lock up garage, solar panels, bungalow out the back, off street parking, sunroom, laundry, dishwasher and much more. Make sure you add this home to your inspection list. Don't miss out call today!

Description:
Perfect Investment or 1st Home!
This updated home is perfectly located, walking distance to Schools, Early Learning Centre, Goldsworthy Reserve, Corio Central shops and public transport. Set on a good size allotment, it offers an updated kitchen/meals area that overlooks a good size living room, three bedrooms with built in robes, central bathroom and separate toilet & laundry. Other features include dishwasher, gas ducted heating and air conditioner, garden shed and side drive to garage. With new carpets and blinds & freshly painted, this home provides easy access to Melbourne and is ideal for the first home buyer or investors! This is your opportunity to secure this great property. Inspection is a must! Please note, Photo ID required at inspections.

Description:
More Than Meets The Eye
Situated perfectly for convenience, this home sits on a corner allotment allowing plenty of opportunity for astute investors looking for a great home to rent out with future knockdown/subdivision potential (STCA). This home is a hop, skip and a jump away from the entrance to the Ring Road, moments from local parks, schools, convenience stores and of course Corio Shopping Centre.
A prime feature of this style of home is the second living area, making this home the perfect family package.
- 3 good sized bedrooms with BIRs
- Kitchen offers ample cupboard space, dishwasher & gas cooking
- Open plan kitchen/dining/living with split system A/C and additional gas heating
- Second carpeted living zone is large with wall A/C
- Central renovated bathroom with walk in shower and separate toilet
- Single garage with added work shop area which can fit 2 cars
- Double carport with secure gates
- Undercover concrete patio for entertaining

"Perfect for first home buyer or Investors!"
In-Room Auction 6pm Tuesday 25th February 2020 at Millars Cafe (80 Westlakes Boulevard, Lara)
This property provides the perfect opportunity for first home buyers to enter the market or for investors to add to their portfolio. Set on a great sized block of 631m2 (approx.), the property boasts three fantastic sized bedrooms two with built in robes, a large formal living area with a gas wall heater and ceiling fan, and kitchen with gas appliances. Located just a short distance to Northern Bay College, local shops & public transport. Easy access to the Princes Highway makes commuting a breeze with the Melbourne CBD only a 50 minute drive and the Geelong CBD a short 15 minute drive.

Description:
Designed to impress.
Located in the growing suburb of Corio, this well maintained home set on 664m2 (approx.) is sure to impress. You will amazed by the beauty this home as to offer from the minute you walk through the door.
Boasting three good size bedrooms all with built in robe's, large lounge upon entry with split system heating and cooling and roller shutters, which then flows off to the quality kitchen and dining area with ample bench & cupboard space and a dishwasher. An updated central bathroom services the home with stunning wall to floor tiles and single vanity.
The gorgeous landscaping on this property is second to none and in the warmer weather heading out into the rear yard, the undercover alfresco will be put to great use and so will your barbeque.
The fully enclosed rear yard is ideal to have the kids playing out in the sun and your pets roaming around on the sizeable lawn area and also includes a double carport. Call to inspect today!

Description:
Ripe for Development Pocket to Profit
This property is situated on a large 1115m2 (approx) east facing rectangular block with close proximity to:
• Schools: St Thomas Aquinas School (975m approx) / St Francis Xavier School (1.03km approx) / Glenvale School - Geelong Campus (2.16km approx)
• Shops: Corio Village Shopping Centre (1.1km approx)
• Public Transport: North Shore Train Station (2.1km approx) / Bus Stop - Routes 1, 20 & 22 (450m approx)
• Easy Princes Highway access (80m approx) & Geelong CBD only a short drive (8.5km approx).
This blue chip location has the potential to be a fantastic development; Town planning approval for 3 lot subdivision have been approved and being situated in the growth zone could potentially be 6 (STCA).
Contact Glen Wilson on 0410 454 034 or Emanuel Mikasinovic on 0490 895 824.

Public transport is at your doorstep, with easy access to the Geelong Ring Road for commuting, and medical facilities, shops & schools are all within walking distance.

Description:
Tastefully Renovated & Turnkey Ready
Established on a handy 557m2 block (approx) with superior access to all the local amenities Corio has on offer, you'll discover this quality recently updated brick veneer home on its own title that is sure to tick all the boxes for both investors and home buyers alike.
Featuring 3 bedrooms, master including a beautiful bay window, built-in robes and convenient air conditioning, 2 separate living zones, lounge with gas wall heater, wood coonara and air conditioning unit for year-round comfort, an updated kitchen that boasts a large pantry, new benchtops, gas stove, rangehood and splashback, all of which come together to bring a very warm family-friendly heart of the home.
The exterior of the property is fully equipped with a garage with power, a large under roofline alfresco perfect for entertaining your family or friends and ample rear yard space.
Extra features include a fully updated central bathroom with new shower, vanity and bath, a new toilet, an alarm with an isolation switch, double glazing to all front-facing windows, new tapware and light fittings throughout plus much much more.
Be sure to add this property to your inspection list. You won't be disappointed.
Key Features
- 3 bedrooms, master featuring a bay window & built-in robes
- Set on a 557m2 block (approx)
- Fully updated central bathroom
- 2 separate living zones
- Updated kitchen with new benchtops, large pantry & new stove and rangehood
- Gas wall heater, wood Coonara and two split systems for year-round comfort
- New tapware and light fittings throughout
- Alarm with an isolation switch
- Large undercover alfresco
- Fresh paint throughout
- Ample low maintenance yards
*Every precaution has been taken to establish accuracy of the above information but does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.

Description:
Affordable Family Comfort in a Quiet Court Location
This elegant single level home is matched to many lifestyles. Delivering on comfort and space at every turn, this much-loved residence is ripe and ready for its new owners to take full advantage of this properties potential!
The family friendly four bedroom, two living area floorplan hosts a spacious open plan lounge and dining zone, an updated kitchen with gas cooktop, breakfast bar, dishwasher, electric oven and plenty of storage! The second lounge provides ample space that caters to the whole family along with the well-appointed central bathroom with bath, shower and separate toilet.
Step outside and enjoy the undercover entertaining / carport area that looks out onto the generous rear yard, providing a great space for the kids or pets. Car accommodation is well catered for by the large double garage, expansive driveway and carport.
Additionally lavished with a gorgeous Coonara wood heater, split system heating and cooling in both living zone, ceiling fans and built in robes to the bedrooms.
Offering exceptional living combined with an unmissable opportunity for a savvy buyer to take advantage of this well-established property proposition. Perfect for families, Melbourne commuters, first home buyers or investors alike with an estimated rental return of $370.00 - $380.00 per week.
Resting on approximately 705m2 this brick beauty ticks all the boxes for your next family home. Delivering an abundance of space for the whole family and all within easy proximity to shops, schools and commuter connectivity.
Roncon Real Estate An Agency like no other!

Description:
Make Your Move - Mortgagee In Possession
Bursting with opportunity this solid home offers space and light. With a vast lounge room, through to a modern kitchen that is open to the bright dining area. Each bedroom is generous with built-in-robes plus new carpets in 2 bedrooms (1 bedroom has floating floors). The bathroom has also been renovated and there is a separate WC. Freshly painted with many updates and modern conveniences to be enjoyed. The yard is private with high gates and fencing on a large 604 sqm (approx) allotment with a huge double garage with mechanics pit and workshop area. This quiet street is handy to Corio Shopping Central, Schools, Transport and offers easy access to both the Highway and Ring Road plus only moments away to medical and wellness facilities. In a location offering loads of scope for future growth (this suburb offers real value) and with a motivated vendor with strict terms this could be the best buy of 2020.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Spacious entertainer.
Immediately comfortable and updated throughout, this charming home offers a great living experience. Set on a generous 695m2 (approx.) block, this home represents an excellent opportunity to enter the market or invest in a growing area.
Featuring a practical floorplan providing a light filled lounge, 3 bedrooms (all with BIRs) and updated bathroom and kitchen. Also offering seamless indoor and outdoor living with direct access from the meals area to a very impressive under alfresco. Features also include double glazed windows throughout, air conditioning, ducted heating, stone benchtops, gas cook top with electric oven and grill, dishwasher, soft closing kitchen cupboards and a three car garage with workshop. You will also find spray and timer watering systems in the front and rear yards and a gas kitchen is also set up in the undercover alfresco area.
All within close proximity to Corio Shopping Centre, local schools, public transport, Waterworld Leisure Centre and easy access to the Princes Highway and Geelong Ring Road. This home has so much to offer, an inspection is highly recommended.

Description:
Perfect family home.
In the ever-growing suburb of Corio is this fantastic family home privately positioned in a quiet street location. Situated on a 572m2 (approx.) block with plenty of yard space for the kids to play or pets to run around. This home suits and is ready for those looking to start or grow their family. Offering four great sized bedrooms and a central bathroom.
Open plan kitchen/dining area complete with bench and storage space and a dishwasher. Leading out to the back yard you will be spoilt with how much space there is in the private and secure yard where the kids can play. Other features include split system air conditioning, solar panels, gas heating, separate laundry and garden shed. Located within close proximity to all major amenities such as the Corio Shopping centre, local schools, cafes, public transport, and the Princes Highway for commutes. Ideally located to suit everyone's needs. Call to inspect today.

Description:
Prime position in the heart of Corio.
Approved Plans & Permits for 3 Units.
Calling all first home buyers, downsizers and investors alike. If you are looking for a solid starter into the market you won't find better value than this neat and much loved home located on approx. 549m2 of land.
The home comprises of three comfortable bedrooms (complete with BIRs), a spacious lounge with gas heater that opens up into the practical kitchen/meals area, a neat central bathroom along with an additional second toilet located adjacent the laundry. Other features of the home include roller shutters and solar panels.
The home boasts easy access to all amenities including Corio Shopping Centre, public transport, schools for all ages and is just minutes from the Princes Highway and Ring Road for commuters. With all the opportunities this home has to offer, make no mistake at this price it will not last!

Description:
This home has it all!
One step inside this home and your search is sure to be over. Offered in immaculate conditon this home comprises a lounge with speakers for surround sound, fixed TV cabinet, airconditoner and a gas wall furnace and a wood heater to keep you cosy on cold winter nights. The adjoining kitchen/dining area has been updated approximately 5 years ago, with a stainless steel gas upright stove and dishwasher. The dining area opens out through a glass sliding door to the private undercover pergola area. The three bedrooms are all a good size, two have built in robes, master has an ensuite and walk in robe. The main bathroom provides a separate bath and shower and separate toilet.
Outdoors is the entertainers delight with stunning gardens, a bar area, decking and cafe blinds so it can be utilised all year round.
There is plenty of offstreet parking with a double carport with a remote door plus an oversized double garage. The home is secured with electric gate entry. Extras include solar panels, cubby house and 3 water tanks for the gardens.
Be quick to enquire on this one, homes that tick all the boxes like this don't stay on the market for long!
Please note, photos and information are to provide a general idea of the property. Prospective buyers are advised to inspect and make their own enquiries with respect to the information relating to properties. All information is supplied by third parties and is believed to be accurate at time of publication and merely passed on by the agency. Eastwood Andrews will not be liable for any loss resulting from reliance on the information supplied.

Description:
The Perfect Family Entertainer
Situated in a sought after pocket of Corio, a quiet street, yet so convenient to everything the Northern Suburbs has to offer. Easy access to the Ring Road brings Melbourne only 50 minutes away, Geelong CBD only 15 minutes, Corio Shopping Centre only 5 minutes drive & local schools such as St Francis Xavier & Northern Bay College very close by.
* 4 bedrooms all with built in robes
* Master suite with ensuite and walk in robe and roller shutter
* Large kitchen with 900mm gas cooktop, wall oven, dishwasher & heaps of bench and cupboard space
* Adjoining dining/living area with wood fireplace, split system, skylight & doors leading out to extensive outdoor undercover area
* Second living area at the front of the home with roller shutter and brick feature wall
* Ducted heating throughout
* Double garage with internal access and rear access door with huge undercover carport leading to additional double garage/workshop
* Large 619sqm (approx.) block
